directions: Fill a pot with water and bring to a boil. Add potatoes, carrots, bell pepper, and onion and cook until potatoes are tender, 15 to 20 minutes. Cook 1 more minute. Drain.

Combine potatoes, carrots, bell pepper, onion, hummus, coconut milk, nutritional yeast, lemon juice, garlic powder, black pepper, and salt in a blender or food processor; blend until smooth and creamy.
ingredients: 2 small russet potatoes, peeled and cubed
⅓ large yellow bell pepper, chopped
¼ large yellow onion, peeled and chopped
⅓ cup coconut milk, or more as needed
title: (Actually Good) Vegan Cheese Sauce
